name: #2 "Disgust" Plot version
description:
Disgust is the feeling of rejection or repugnance towards a person or thing. 

 This is the second piece of the collection "diorama of emotions" which consists of 16 pieces inspired by the wheel of emotions created by psychologist Robert Plutchik.
 
Starting from the psychological basis I seek to represent through the architecture and the fantasy environment each of the emotions that Plutchik defines as those that make up the psyche of the human being.
